messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: Sometimes clichés are right - I'm standing for election because I want to make a difference. Isn't that what an MP should do?

messages.title: It's all about the incinerator
messages.content: Two years ago the Tories were told about plans for an incinerator near Ivybridge and Lee Mill but they didn't do anything about it until Labour started campaigning.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luke has been leading the fight against the incinerator. He demands action from the Tories about the incinerator and led the campaign against it.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sometimes clichés are right - I'm standing for election because I want to make a difference. Isn't that what an MP should do?

politicalExperience.achievements: Leading the fight against the incinerator in SW Devon.

endorsements.endorsement: I think most people know that Luke has been leading the fight against the incinerator. We need an MP with a bit of get-up-and-go - we need an MP like Luke.

images.caption: Luke with local residents campaigning against the incinerator.

leaflet.additionalNotes: My pledges to you: I will be a full time MP, I will prioritize cancer care, I will protect our public services, I will oppose the NHS, denting, school cuts in vital services, I will support a living minimum wage.
